column2: LME - Printing GD replicate labels for Growth promotion via LME
column3:
*For Growth promotion testing we have 1 sample ID with multiple Replicates
*Requirement to print GD label per replicate
*Current situation is that only 1 component per sample can be send to GD instrument.

column2: LME – Justification reason linked to open step in Review Method Execution Screen
column3:
*When LME is completed with empty cells justification reason entry is required
*Request to add the justification reason to the steps which is not filled during finish Method
*Via this way all steps will be visible within the review screen even if they are not filled.
column4: 1620 - LME – Justification reason linked to open step in Review Method Execution Screen - eLIMS - Confluence (jnj.com)

column2: LME – Block auto verification (set up on test level) when LME is not reviewed
column3:
*Build in Mechanisme that when a autoverification is set up that this autoverification is not happening the moment when not all steps within the LME session are accepted.
*Current situation is that when you perform the autoverification that you sample results are released before the LME review is performed.
column4: 1682 - LME – Block autoverification (set up on test level) when LME is not reviewed - eLIMS - Confluence (jnj.com)
